Title: 37308 - # Affordable Tools for Starting a Small Business
Direction: 675 words. Make a list of four to eight affordable tools that entrepreneurs can use to start new businesses without spending a lot of money. The resource links mention things like ecommerce tools, email campaign services, and cloud-based document signing apps. You can include the client URL and keyword phrase in a section about the benefits of using Sage's cloud-based accounting software. Your target audience is interested in starting a small business.
Extra Writer Notes: Example AT: Sage One's cloud accounting
